vehicles.description: Several parked cars on the right side of the road, colors ranging from white to dark, occupying designated parking spaces
vehicles.explanation: Parked cars indicate a busy area and could potentially obscure pedestrians stepping out.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A group of cyclists in the center of the road, some wearing bright clothing, heading in the same direction as the ego car
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: Cyclists can affect flow of traffic and may need room to maneuver.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A pedestrian in a light-colored shirt appears to be crossing the road from the right to the left, just in front of the parked cars
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: Pedestrian crossing the road could cause sudden stops or require evasive actions.

traffic signs.description: A blue parking sign on the right side of the road indicating a parking area
traffic signs.explanation: Suggests the presence of vehicles entering and exiting parking spots which may affect traffic flow.

other objects.description: Several benches and lampposts on the sidewalk, trees lining the edge of the road on both sides
other objects.explanation: These objects may partially obstruct the view of the road and sidewalk, requiring vigilance for hidden road users.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there are several parked cars on the right side of the road, with colors ranging from white to dark, occupying designated parking spaces. These parked cars indicate a busy area and could potentially obscure pedestrians stepping out.

Additionally, there is a group of cyclists in the center of the road, some wearing bright clothing, heading in the same direction as the ego car. These cyclists can affect the flow of traffic and may need room to maneuver. A pedestrian in a light-colored shirt appears to be crossing the road from the right to the left, just in front of the parked cars. This pedestrian could cause sudden stops or require evasive actions.

There is also a blue parking sign on the right side of the road indicating a parking area. This sign suggests the presence of vehicles entering and exiting parking spots, which may affect traffic flow.

Other objects include several benches and lampposts on the sidewalk, with trees lining the edge of the road on both sides. These objects may partially obstruct the view of the road and sidewalk, requiring vigilance for hidden road users.

1.description and explanation: A pedestrian is present, moving alongside the street. Cautious driving is advised since pedestrians can be unpredictable and may enter the roadway, necessitating readiness to stop or slow down to avoid accidents.

driving_suggestion: Proceed with reduced speed, maintain a vigilant watch for cyclists and the pedestrian crossing the road. Be prepared to yield to the crossing pedestrian and give adequate space to the cyclists. Monitor the parked cars for any movement that suggests a car might pull out into traffic.
